    Bootstrap uncertainty for actflow metrics

    actflow_uncertainty.Rd

    Bootstrap uncertainty for actflow metrics

    actflow_uncertainty(
  act_group,
  fc_group,
  metric = c("corr", "R2", "mae"),
  n_boot = 1000,
  conf_level = 0.95,
  seed = NULL,
  parallel = FALSE,
  act_group_test = NULL,
  use_cpp = TRUE,
  comparison = "fullcompare_compthenavg",
  transfer = c("linear", "relu", "sigmoid", "logit"),
  ...
)

    Arguments

    act_group

    Array with dimensions (nodes x conditions x subjects).

    fc_group

    Array with dimensions (nodes x nodes x subjects) or (nodes x nodes x conditions x subjects).

    metric

    Metrics to summarize. Any of corr, R2, mae.

    n_boot

    Number of bootstrap resamples over subjects.

    conf_level

    Confidence level for percentile intervals.

    seed

    Optional RNG seed for reproducible bootstrap draws.

    parallel

    If TRUE, use future.apply::future_lapply() when available.

    act_group_test

    Optional test activations (same dimensions as act_group).

    use_cpp

    Use native kernels when available.

    comparison

    Comparison type; currently only fullcompare_compthenavg.

    transfer

    Transfer function for actflow prediction.

    ...

    Reserved for forward compatibility.

    Value

    A list with point estimates, interval bounds, bootstrap summaries, and bootstrap configuration metadata.

    Contents

    Developed by Ben Buchsbaum.
